    Create a Seurat object with Splice object

    createSpliceSeurat.Rd

    Create a Seurat and Splice object from the output file from saveExonList().

    Usage

    createSpliceSeurat(
  path,
  project = "SeuratProject",
  assay = "RNA",
  min.cells = 3,
  min.features = 20,
  names.field = 1,
  names.delim = "_",
  meta.data = NULL,
  ...
)

    Arguments

    path

    The path to store the output files from saveExonList()

    project

    The name of the project for this object

    assay

    The assay name for the count matrix

    min.cells

    The minimum number of cells to express a gene

    min.features

    The minimum number of genes cell to express

    names.field

    For the initial identity class for each cell, choose this field from the cell's name.

    names.delim

    For the initial identity class for each cell, choose this delimiter from the cell's column name

    meta.data

    Additional cell-level metadata to add to the Seurat object.

    ...

    other parameters for Seurat::CreateSeuratObject

    Details

    The Seraut object is created to store the gene expression information, and the Splice object for isoform information. The Splice object is embedded in the misc slot in Seurat object

    On this page
